architecture.title: Architecture
architecture.description: The project follows a feature-based architecture with clear separation of concerns:
architecture.feature1: App Router for intuitive file-based routing
architecture.feature2: Server Components by default for optimal performance
architecture.feature3: Static export capability for flexible deployment options

technologies.title: Core Technologies
technologies.nextjs: React framework with App Router and Server Components for building modern web applications
technologies.typescript: Strict mode enabled for comprehensive type safety and better developer experience
technologies.tailwind: Modern utility-first CSS framework with custom theme support
technologies.i18n: Complete internationalization support with type-safe translations

bestPractices.title: Best Practices
bestPractices.practice1: Always use Link component for internal navigation to benefit from prefetching
bestPractices.practice2: Use generateStaticParams for all dynamic routes to enable static export

bestPractices.practice4: Always include locale parameter in page components for i18n support

whatIsZustand.title: What is Zustand?
whatIsZustand.description: Zustand is a small, fast, and scalable state management solution. It provides a simple API with minimal boilerplate:
whatIsZustand.feature1: Minimal boilerplate - no providers or reducers needed
whatIsZustand.feature2: TypeScript support out of the box
whatIsZustand.feature3: Middleware support for persist, devtools, and more
whatIsZustand.feature4: Perfect for both small and large applications

middleware.description: This boilerplate uses two essential middleware:

middleware.devtoolsDescription: Enables Redux DevTools integration for debugging (development only)

bestPractices.title: Best Practices
bestPractices.practice1: Use selectors to subscribe to specific state slices and prevent unnecessary re-renders
bestPractices.practice2: Create custom hooks for related state and actions to improve component API
bestPractices.practice3: Always check hydration state when using persisted values in SSR
bestPractices.practice4: Use TypeScript for type-safe state management
bestPractices.practice5: Keep stores focused on a single domain (UI, user, data, etc.)
